price: Man never tires of asking for good, but if evil touches him, he is desperate and despondent.
arabic: لَّا يَسۡـَٔمُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِن دُعَآءِ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ وَإِن مَّسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ فَيَـُٔوسٞ قَنُوطٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
